1.content: Alright, Edgar. Which Family and what Age?
1.title: Family and Age

info.brief_description: You find yourself shrunk with you male family members.
info.description:
You are Edgar, a mostly normal 16-21 year old and you find yourself shrunk with your male family members after eating a piece of cake from the kitchen.
You live with all of your male family members. Your father and his husband, your brothers, and your uncle.

Family #1

Father and his Husband. (Frank and Richard.)
Frank, your father is a large tall man standing at 6’4 and is a real dilf. He has a good bit of muscle, a short beard and is very hairy. He loves that he’s taller than you and he’s very protective of you. He’s very famous for his bear hugs and he often calls you and your brothers his “cubs”.
Richard, is a very doting parent. He absolutely loves you and your brothers. Richard is very maternal and acts as the mother you never had. He is also very protective of you. He is not as muscled as your father and he isn’t as hairy.

Brothers. (Allan and Victor.)
Allan takes a lot from Frank. He is muscled and also quite hairy with a beard. He is very protective of you and often calls you “lil bro.” He’s very playful and knows that you’re bi. He’ll often walk around without a shirt and will flirt with you from time to time.

Victor is the black sheep of the family, he likes comics and heavy metal.(That’s why you love it as well.) He isn’t as protective and knows you can handle yourself. You two often hang out on his bed reading comics and listening to Rob Zombie or a different band you both like.

Uncle. (Lewis.)
Lewis works as a gay strip artist and loves you and your brothers like his own. He is also very muscled and hairy. He also gives you a hug when he sees you and he’s the guy to call whenever you need anything.


Family #2

Father(David.) a very large man who’s very hairy and has a large gut. He has salt and pepper hair. He’s very playful and is a little gross. He has a boyfriend named drake who is skinnier and looks a little like you.

Brothers. (Lee and Jim.)

Lee is a bit on the heavier side and likes to dominate you. He’s gross and takes pride in it.

Jim is the same way. He’s very hairy like your father and loves to dominate you with his size and stenches.


Uncle.(Steve.)
Your uncle Steve, horny and hairy. He has a large gut like your father and will often flirt with you. He always tell you how handsome you’ve became.

Cousins. (Bruce and Clark.)
Your cousins are muscled and love to dominate you like your brothers but are a lot more flirtatious.

Fetishes that are welcome: All Vore, Gas, Feet, Musk, Scat and Watersports, squashing.

Death is allowed.

Chapters must at least be a paragraph and please be very descriptive.
info.pretty_title: Shrunk With Your Male Family Members
